name.ja: ウェブセッションスイッチャー

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: A tool to switch between multiple sessions with a single click.
short.de: Ein Werkzeug zum Wechseln zwischen Sitzungen mit einem Klick.
short.es: Una herramienta para cambiar entre sesiones con un clic.
short.fr: Un outil pour passer entre plusieurs sessions en un clic.
short.it: Strumento per passare tra più sessioni con un clic.
short.ja: 複数のセッションを一度のクリックで切り替えられるツールです。
short.ko: 한 번의 클릭으로 여러 세션을 전환하는 도구입니다.
short.ru: Инструмент для переключения между сессиями одним кликом.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Web Storage Switch - A tool to switch between multiple sessions with a single click.

● This plugin function is very simple, on the already logged in website, first enter the user name, if you do not enter, the default value will be used. Then click the Save button to save the session. When you log in to another user and want to switch back to the previous account, you can click the generated switch button to quickly switch.
● After the plug-in is installed, the data is stored in your local, this plug-in will not send personal data to the network, please feel free to use it.
● Please note that this feature is not available on all sites and is not available on some sites with high security requirements.
● This plugin was developed to help developers quickly switch sessions, which is handy when developing some management systems that require multiple users to approve operations.
